parameters.query: SELECT id, booking_id, user_id, message, channel, recipient, priority, payload, retry_count, max_retries, error_message FROM notification_queue WHERE status = 'failed' AND retry_count < COALESCE(max_retries, 3) AND (next_retry_at IS NULL OR next_retry_at <= NOW()) ORDER BY priority DESC, created_at ASC LIMIT 20;
UPDATE notification_queue SET status = 'sent', sent_at = NOW(), error_message = NULL WHERE id = $1::uuid;

UPDATE notification_queue SET status = CASE WHEN retry_count >= max_retries THEN 'failed' ELSE 'pending' END, retry_count = $1, next_retry_at = CASE WHEN retry_count >= max_retries THEN NULL ELSE NOW() + INTERVAL '5 minutes' END, error_message = $2, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = $3::uuid;
